text: Belgian DJ and record producer duo Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike released their first compilation album in 2014. "Mammoth" was their first single to chart in four countries. "Tremor" with Martin Garrix became their most successful single so far as it has charted in five countries, their only song to achieve this. == Albums == === Compilation albums === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of compilation albums |- !
